efforts.name: Development Foundation
efforts.description: Establish development practices and workflows for your team

projects.name: Team Setup
projects.description: Get your team's development environment ready

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up team access
tasks.description: Create accounts for all team members. Configure permissions and access levels appropriate for each role.

tasks.title: Establish development standards
tasks.description: Define coding standards, naming conventions, and best practices for your team. Create style guides and templates.

tasks.title: Set up version control
tasks.description: Configure Git repositories. Set up branching strategy and code review process. Train team on version control basics.

tasks.title: Create development documentation
tasks.description: Document your setup process, common workflows, and troubleshooting guides. Make it easy for team members to get started.

tasks.title: Set up collaboration tools
tasks.description: Configure project management, communication, and documentation tools. Ensure everyone knows how to use them.

tasks.title: Establish code review process
tasks.description: Define code review guidelines and process. Ensure quality and knowledge sharing through reviews.

projects.name: First Team Project
projects.description: Build your first team AI agent project together

tasks.title: ⭐ Choose team project
tasks.description: Select a project that benefits multiple team members. Get input from the team and prioritize based on impact.

tasks.title: Plan project structure
tasks.description: Design the architecture together. Define components, interfaces, and how pieces fit together.

tasks.title: Assign tasks
tasks.description: Break down work into tasks. Assign based on team members' strengths and learning goals.

tasks.title: Set up project tracking
tasks.description: Use project management tools to track progress. Set up boards, tasks, and milestones for visibility.

tasks.title: Review and iterate
tasks.description: Conduct regular reviews. Gather feedback, identify improvements, and iterate on the project.

tasks.title: Document lessons learned
tasks.description: Capture what worked well and what didn't. Document lessons learned for future projects.

efforts.name: API Integration
efforts.description: Learn to integrate with APIs and build connections between systems

tasks.title: ⭐ Learn API fundamentals
tasks.description: Understand what APIs are and how they work. Learn about requests, responses, and authentication basics.

tasks.title: Explore available APIs
tasks.description: Review APIs available in your platform. Understand what each API does and when to use it.

tasks.title: Test API connections
tasks.description: Make test API calls to verify connectivity. Use API testing tools or simple scripts to test endpoints.

tasks.title: Understand authentication
tasks.description: Learn how API authentication works. Understand API keys, tokens, and secure credential management.

tasks.title: Handle API errors
tasks.description: Learn to interpret API error messages. Understand common errors and how to resolve them.

tasks.title: Document API usage
tasks.description: Document how your team uses APIs. Create examples and guides for common API operations.

projects.name: Integration Patterns
projects.description: Learn common integration patterns and best practices

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify integration needs
tasks.description: List systems and tools that need to integrate. Identify data flows and integration points.

tasks.title: Design integration approach
tasks.description: Plan how systems will connect. Consider data formats, timing, and error handling.

tasks.title: Use pre-built connectors
tasks.description: Leverage existing connectors and integrations when available. Save time by using proven solutions.

tasks.title: Test integrations thoroughly
tasks.description: Test integrations with real data. Verify data accuracy and handle edge cases.

tasks.title: Monitor integration health
tasks.description: Set up monitoring for integrations. Track success rates, errors, and performance.

tasks.title: Create integration documentation
tasks.description: Document integration setup and configuration. Include troubleshooting guides and common issues.

efforts.name: Quality & Testing
efforts.description: Ensure quality and reliability of your team's work

projects.name: Testing Practices
projects.description: Establish testing practices for your team

tasks.title: ⭐ Define testing approach
tasks.description: Establish testing practices for your team. Define what to test, when to test, and how to test.

tasks.title: Create test cases
tasks.description: Write test cases for key functionality. Include normal cases, edge cases, and error scenarios.

tasks.title: Set up test environments
tasks.description: Create test environments separate from production. Use test data and configurations.

tasks.title: Implement manual testing
tasks.description: Create manual testing checklists and procedures. Ensure consistent testing across team members.

tasks.title: Document test results
tasks.description: Record test results and issues found. Track what was tested and outcomes.

tasks.title: Establish bug tracking
tasks.description: Set up process for tracking bugs and issues. Prioritize fixes and track resolution.

projects.name: Quality Assurance
projects.description: Ensure consistent quality across team projects

tasks.title: ⭐ Define quality standards
tasks.description: Establish quality standards for your team. Define what 'done' means and quality criteria.

tasks.title: Create quality checklists
tasks.description: Develop checklists for quality reviews. Include code quality, documentation, and testing requirements.

tasks.title: Implement peer reviews
tasks.description: Set up peer review process. Have team members review each other's work for quality and learning.

tasks.title: Track quality metrics
tasks.description: Measure quality metrics: bug rates, test coverage, code review feedback. Track trends over time.

tasks.title: Continuously improve
tasks.description: Regularly review and improve quality processes. Learn from issues and refine practices.

tasks.title: Celebrate quality wins
tasks.description: Recognize team members who maintain high quality. Build culture of quality excellence.
